name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
schedule:
Wk 1~2 September 11/14/18 Orientation and Introduction
Wks 2~4 September 21/25/28/October 2 – Morphology
Wks 4~6 October 5/9/12/16 – Syntax
Wk 6 October 19 – First Midterm Exam
Wks 7~8 October 23/26/30/November 2 – Semantics
Wks 9~12 November 6/9/23/27 – Pragmatics
Wk 12 November 30 – Second Midterm Exam
Wks 13~14 December 4/7/11/14/19 – Phonetics
Wks 15~17 December 18/21/25/28/January 4 – Phonology
Wk 18 January 8 – Final exams
END
scorePolicy:
Exams: October 19/November 30/January 8, 50%
Quizzes and Homework: 40%
Attendance: 10% (10 points deduction for every absence, textbook check counts as attendance check)
END
materials: Language Files 12th edition. The Ohio State University Press. ISBN: 978957445725-0
